Ads Manager Job at 1159 Realty




        
    

        
        1159 Realty is a leading real estate business focused on young investors. We have a mission to bridge the gap between the capital intensiveness of the real estate industry and young investors who have been sidelined for lack of capital.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Ads Manager

Job Location: Ilorin, Kwara 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Are you looking to join an organization passionate about individual growth and a healthy working culture?
	1159 Realty is hiring an experienced Ads Manager to oversee and execute result-driven advertising campaigns across all digital platforms, including Google, Meta (Facebook & Instagram), TikTok, X, and LinkedIn.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Minimum of 3–5 years of hands-on experience in paid digital advertising
	Deep understanding of lead generation strategy, analytics, and conversion
	Proven results in real estate or similar fast-paced industries
	Strong ability to work with minimal supervision
	A young and vibrant personality is preferred.


Note


	This is not an entry-level role.
	Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Revenue Assurance Assistant",
  "description": "Source Microfinance Bank is a digital bank with a focus on how to serve you better always! At Source Credit, we have our plans to serve you better right at the center of all we do, and our service offerings. We also ensure we give the best customer service experience that is tailored just for you. Source Microfinance Bank is poised to change the face of banking in Nigeria. We are reinventing banking to empower a generation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Revenue Assurance Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Description


	Collaborate&nbsp;with&nbsp;Revenue&nbsp;Assurance&nbsp;to&nbsp;Identify&nbsp;technical&nbsp;challenges&nbsp;with&nbsp;Remit and&nbsp;&nbsp;deductions&nbsp;setup&nbsp;responsible&nbsp;for&nbsp;loan&nbsp;default&nbsp;
	Collaborate&nbsp;with&nbsp;Revenue&nbsp;Assurance&nbsp;to&nbsp;know&nbsp;customers&nbsp;account&nbsp;status&nbsp;with Remit
	To&nbsp;carry&nbsp;out&nbsp;action&nbsp;plans&nbsp;from&nbsp;monthly&nbsp;credit&nbsp;review&nbsp;of&nbsp;delinquent&nbsp;loans.&nbsp;
	Recovery&nbsp;of&nbsp;delinquent&nbsp;loans&nbsp;after&nbsp;credit&nbsp;review.&nbsp;
	?Daily&nbsp;call&nbsp;memo&nbsp;to&nbsp;delinquent&nbsp;customers&nbsp;through&nbsp;phone&nbsp;calls,&nbsp;emails,&nbsp;or&nbsp;even in-person&nbsp;visits&nbsp;to&nbsp;discuss&nbsp;repayment&nbsp;options.&nbsp;
	Negotiate&nbsp;payment&nbsp;plans&nbsp;with&nbsp;debtors,&nbsp;considering&nbsp;their&nbsp;financial&nbsp;situation&nbsp;and aiming&nbsp;to&nbsp;recover&nbsp;the&nbsp;maximum&nbsp;amount&nbsp;possible.&nbsp;
	To&nbsp;do&nbsp;follow&nbsp;with&nbsp;debtors&nbsp;who&nbsp;have&nbsp;gone&nbsp;missing&nbsp;or&nbsp;not&nbsp;reachable.&nbsp;

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Revenue Assurance Assistant

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description
     

            
    




	Collaborate with Revenue Assurance to Identify technical challenges with Remit and  deductions setup responsible for loan default
